[root@linxu ~]# tar xzf redis-4.0.6.tar.gz 
[root@linxu ~]# mkdir /usr/local/redis
[root@linxu ~]# mv redis-4.0.6 /usr/local/redis

2.redis

:

127.0.0.1:6379> set test hahaah  
OK
127.0.0.1:6379> get test
"hahaah"
127.0.0.1:6379>
3.jedisjavaredis 
//pom.xml
<dependency>
    <groupId>redis.clients</groupId>
    <artifactId>jedis</artifactId>
    <version>2.9.0</version>
</dependency>
package com.redis.demo;

import redis.clients.jedis.Jedis;

public class TestRedis {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        // Redis 
        Jedis jedis = new Jedis("192.168.43.163",6379);
        System.out.println("");
        //
        System.out.println(": "+jedis.ping());
    }

}
Exception in thread "main" redis.clients.jedis.exceptions.JedisDataException: DENIED Redis is running in protected mode because protected mode is enabled, no bind address was specified, no authentication password is requested to clients. In this mode connections are only accepted from the loopback interface. If you want to connect from external computers to Redis you may adopt one of the following solutions: 1) Just disable protected mode sending the command 'CONFIG SET protected-mode no' from the loopback interface by connecting to Redis from the same host the server is running, however MAKE SURE Redis is not publicly accessible from internet if you do so. Use CONFIG REWRITE to make this change permanent. 2) Alternatively you can just disable the protected mode by editing the Redis configuration file, and setting the protected mode option to 'no', and then restarting the server. 3) If you started the server manually just for testing, restart it with the '--protected-mode no' option. 4) Setup a bind address or an authentication password. NOTE: You only need to do one of the above things in order for the server to start accepting connections from the outside.
redis.conf 
1.#bind
#bind 127.0.0.1
2.protected-mode yes

protected-mode no
redis

Post.title: WordPressApachenginx
Post.content:
http://xxx.onlymyzhongyi.com/?p=345

1.httpd

#httpd
service httpd stop

#apachep
chkconfig httpd off
2.nginx

yum -y install nginx

3.php-fpm

yum install php-fpm
/etc/init.d/php-fpm start  #
chkconfig php-fpm on

4.nginx

vi /etc/nginx/conf.d/virtual.conf     #

#wordpress
server {
listen 80;
server_name www.reallinxu.com;
access_log /var/log/nginx/aaa/access.log; #access_logngx_http_log_module, levelinfo
error_log /var/log/nginx/aaa/error.log; #error_logcore module, levelerror 

location / {
         root /data/www/www.reallinxu.com;
         index index.php index.html index.htm;     #PHPindex.php
         try_files $uri $uri/ /index.php?$args;   #phprewrite
}

error_page 404 /404.html;         #error_page errcode uri (404/404.html)
location = /404.html {            #location
         root /data/www/www.reallinxu.com;
}

error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html;
location = /50x.html {
         root /data/www/www.reallinxu.com;
}

# .jpgphp.inicgi.fix_pathinfo=0cgi.fix_pathinfophp)
location ~ [^/]\.php(/|$) {
         root /data/www/www.reallinxu.com;
         fastcgi_split_path_info ^(.+?\.php)(/.*)$;
         if (!-f $document_root$fastcgi_script_name) {
                 return 404;
         }
         #try_files $uri =404;         #try_files.php$uri, $uri,404 location /    (
         # pass the PHP scripts to FastCGI server listening on 127.0.0.1:9000
         fastcgi_pass 127.0.0.1:9000;
         fastcgi_index index.php;
         fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME $document_root$fastcgi_script_name;
         include fastcgi_params;
}
location ~ /\.ht {
         deny all;
}

rewrite /wp-admin$ $scheme://$host$uri/ permanent;

}

5.

mkdir -p /var/log/nginx/aaa
chown -R nginx:adm /var/log/nginx/aaa

6.php-mysql

yum update
yum install php-mysql

7.nginx

service nginx start

8.

vi wp-config.php

#
define( WP_DEBUG, true );

define( DB_HOST, 127.0.0.1 );   #localhost

9.

vi /etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf   #
;
pm.max_children = 3
;
pm.start_servers = 1
;
pm.min_spare_servers = 1
;
pm.max_spare_servers = 1
;php_admin
php_admin_value[memory_limit] = 128M

Post.title: Dubbo+Zookeeper+Spring-boot+dubbo-simple
Post._content:
1.Zookeeper 
[root@linxu ~]#  wget http://mirrors.shu.edu.cn/apache/zookeeper/zookeeper-3.5.3-beta/zookeeper-3.5.3-beta.tar.gz
[root@linxu ~]#  tar -zxvf zookeeper-3.5.3-beta.tar.gz  # 
[root@linxu ~]#  tar -xvf zookeeper-3.5.3-beta.tar.gz 
[root@linxu ~]#  mv zookeeper-3.5.3-beta /usr/local/zookeeper #mkdir
[root@linxu ~]#  cd /usr/local/zookeeper/zookeeper-3.5.3-beta/conf
[root@linxu conf]# cp zoo_sample.cfg zoo.cfg
[root@linxu conf]# vi zoo.cfg 
#
dataDir=/usr/local/zookeeper/zookeeper-3.5.3-beta/data
dataLogDir=/usr/local/zookeeper/zookeeper-3.5.3-beta/logs
[root@linxu conf]# vi /etc/profile

export ZOOKEEPER_HOME=/usr/local/zookeeper/zookeeper-3.5.3-beta/
export PATH=$ZOOKEEPER_HOME/bin:$PATH
export PATH
[root@linxu conf]# source /etc/profile #
[root@linxu conf]# zkServer.sh start   #
[root@linxu conf]# zkServer.sh status  #
[root@linxu conf]# zkServer.sh stop    #
[root@linxu conf]# zkServer.sh restart #
2.dubbo-admin githubdubbodubbo-admin(dubbo-admin) dubbohttps://github.com/alibaba/dubbo/tree/dubbo-2.5.8 mvn package -Dmaven.test.skip=true targetwartomcatwebappstomcathttp://localhost:8080/dubbo-admin-2.5.8/ 3.spring-bootprovider(consume) https://github.com/reallinxu/spring-boot-dubbo providerconsumedubbo PSproviderconsume 4.dubbo-simple githubdubboxdubbo-monitor-simple dubboxhttps://github.com/reallinxu/dubbox mvn package -Dmaven.test.skip=true dubbo-monitor-simple-2.8.4-assembly.tar.gz 
[root@linxu dubbo-simple]# tar -zxvf dubbo-monitor-simple-2.8.4-assembly.tar.gz
[root@linxu bin]# cd /usr/local/dubbo-simple/dubbo-monitor-simple-2.8.4/conf
dubbo.properties
dubbo.container=log4j,spring,registry,jetty
dubbo.application.name=simple-monitor
dubbo.application.owner=
#dubbo.registry.address=multicast://224.5.6.7:1234
dubbo.registry.address=zookeeper://192.168.43.163:2181 #Zookeeper
#dubbo.registry.address=redis://127.0.0.1:6379
#dubbo.registry.address=dubbo://127.0.0.1:9090
dubbo.protocol.port=7070
dubbo.jetty.port=7072  #jetty
dubbo.jetty.directory=${user.home}/monitor
dubbo.charts.directory=${dubbo.jetty.directory}/charts
dubbo.statistics.directory=${user.home}/monitor/statistics
dubbo.log4j.file=logs/dubbo-monitor-simple.log
dubbo.log4j.level=WARN
dubbo-simple 
[root@linxu ~]# cd /usr/local/dubbo-simple/dubbo-monitor-simple-2.8.4/bin
[root@linxu bin]# sh start.sh
http://192.168.43.163:7072 (jetty) com.alibaba.dubbo.monitor.MonitorService dubbo.properties zookeeper

Post.title: httphttps
Post.content:
1.SSLhttps://buy.cloud.tencent.com/ssl?fromSource=sslDNS

2.crtkey/usr/local/httpscrt

3.nginx

vi /etc/nginx/conf.d/virtual.conf     #

#wordpress
server {
listen 80;
listen 443 ssl; #443https443ssl onhttphttps
server_name www.reallinxu.com;
access_log /var/log/nginx/aaa/access.log; #access_logngx_http_log_module, levelinfo
error_log /var/log/nginx/aaa/error.log; #error_logcore module, levelerror 

#ssl on;    #
ssl_certificate /usr/local/httpscrt/1_www.reallinxu.com_bundle.crt;  #
ssl_certificate_key /usr/local/httpscrt/2_www.reallinxu.com.key;   #key

location / {
         root /data/www/www.reallinxu.com;
         index index.php index.html index.htm;     #PHPindex.php
         try_files $uri $uri/ /index.php?$args;   #phprewrite
}

error_page 404 /404.html;         #error_page errcode uri (404/404.html)
location = /404.html {            #location
         root /data/www/www.reallinxu.com;
}

error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html;
location = /50x.html {
         root /data/www/www.reallinxu.com;
}

# .jpgphp.inicgi.fix_pathinfo=0cgi.fix_pathinfophp)
location ~ [^/]\.php(/|$) {
         root /data/www/www.reallinxu.com;
         fastcgi_split_path_info ^(.+?\.php)(/.*)$;
         if (!-f $document_root$fastcgi_script_name) {
                 return 404;
         }
         #try_files $uri =404;         #try_files.php$uri, $uri,404 location /    (
         # pass the PHP scripts to FastCGI server listening on 127.0.0.1:9000
         fastcgi_pass 127.0.0.1:9000;
         fastcgi_index index.php;
         fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME $document_root$fastcgi_script_name;
         include fastcgi_params;
}
location ~ /\.ht {
         deny all;
}

rewrite /wp-admin$ $scheme://$host$uri/ permanent;

}

4.nginx
